p:
The endemic and epidemic components of the time series were explored and studied allowing for the separation of the regular pattern from irregular ones in estimating the epidemic peaks. The parameter α
i allows for different incidence levels of the viruses and S is the virus specific number of harmonic waves. The term in curly brackets captures seasonal variations. The
γ
s and
δ
s are the seasonal parameters while ω
s = 2 πs/12 for monthly data are the Fourier frequencies.
